channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Saturday Morning Gift Show
channel.desc: Start ticking off from your Christmas gifts list with this fun-packed morning show. You'll find everything from toys for all ages, glam beauty gifts and hi-tech gadgets - all at great prices.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Slipper Shop
channel.desc: Discover our Slipper Shop show and keep your feet toasty and warm with our range including designs with hard soles and orthotic technology plus cosy sheepskin styles.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Oisha Jewellery
channel.desc: Discover the world of Oisha - elegant jewellery that you'll treasure forever. Exquisitely crafted in India, each captivating piece will sit on your skin as a work of art in breath-taking detail.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Lara Pearls Collection
channel.desc: Harness the beauty of pearls with the Lara Pearls Collection, offering stunning jewellery set with elegant pearls for over 20 years. Discover a piece for your jewellery box or a loved one's today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Radley
channel.desc: Radley fashion accessories provide an aspirational mix of style, attention to detail and desirability, offering designs for every occasion that make you look and feel fabulous.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Accessories Gifts with Pieces
channel.desc: Discover must-have accessory gifts with Pieces. From chic bags to stylish jewellery, find the perfect finishing touches to delight your loved ones this season.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Lara Pearls Collection
channel.desc: Harness the beauty of pearls with the Lara Pearls Collection, offering stunning jewellery set with elegant pearls for over 20 years. Discover a piece for your jewellery box or a loved one's today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dressage by Paul Costelloe
channel.desc: Discover the elegance of Paul's Costelloe's Dressage collection. Embodying simplicity and luxury, and using high-quality leathers, fittings and techniques to bring his inspirational designs to life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Annie Haak Jewellery
channel.desc: Discover Annie Haak Jewellery, a gorgeous range of fine designs comprising necklaces, pendants, earrings, bracelets and more. A great gift at any idea, you'll love what Annie Haak has to offer.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Luella Grey
channel.desc: Discover Luella Grey's luxurious handbags and accessories. Designed with 30 years of experience, find elegant, contemporary pieces for every occasion.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Fire Light Lab Grown Diamonds
channel.desc: Introducing Fire Light Lab Grown Diamonds, boasting the same physical, optical and chemical properties as a natural mined diamond, but at a more affordable price.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: L'Occitane Indulgent Gifts
channel.desc: Discover a range of bath, body and home products from Provence, formulated with natural ingredients such as olive, verbena, lavender and shea butter. This show is packed with wonderful gift sets.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Gifts for Men
channel.desc: From gadgets to grooming, fund the perfect gift for the special man in your life from our carefully chosen selection, with all age brackets in mind.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Stylish Gifting Event
channel.desc: Need to find a stylish gift for that difficult-to-buy-for fashionista friend? Look no further than this fabulous show full of great gift ideas that friends and family will love.
